Changelog
=========

0.3.0 (2009/07/06)
------------------

* switched to repoze.bfg

0.2.0 (2009/07/06)
------------------

* improved handling of temporary directories


0.1.2 (2009/07/05)
------------------

* improved handling of temporary directories

0.1.1 (2009/07/05)
------------------

* improved logging and error handling

0.1 (2009/07/05)
----------------

* Initial release
